lines.text: We have ways of making you sweat here.
Maybe if you mess him up a little, he'll talk.
Cold? A night in the sweat-box will fix that up.
Better check to see if you've got everything that's coming to you. Should be a couple of uniforms, a rifle, billy-club, and Black Annie.

[nodding toward whip]
You'll find that your best friend, Granger. These cons are pretty thick but Black Annie's one language they all understand.

[to Cliff Roberts]
Three lashes ain't enough. Keep going.
What did you come here for? Just to torture me some more?
I want to be your friend, Snead.
